name: Incineroar's Big Birthday
description:
Controls:

Directional buttons/Arrow or WASD keys: Move when on top-down mode

A Button/Alt, Z or J key: Interact/Accept

B Button/Ctrl, X or K key: Cancel

Start Button/Enter Key: Start the game (Title screen), otherwise unused

In this game you control the hardy Chesnaught, after he finally became friends with the hooligan Incineroar. It is the fire cat's birthday and our protagonist gotta deliver a gift. The main issue is he has been busy and gotta find something in the very last minute. What will our hero do?

A pet project I had while teaching friends a few things about coding by making games with GB Studio 1.x. Based on a fan comic (link here) by my good friend elAlvaradog (aka Wan Shot Comics - Warning: NSFW content in the account) originally released in 2019, with a successful kickstarter for a re-release last year (2020).

This game is a very short game. I estimate you may take about 10-15 minutes in your first playthrough, and around 5 minutes in the following ones. There's a total of 9 endings you can earn based on your actions.

It is a game made for fun, and more rushed than I want to admit. Still, I hope you all can have fun playing it, just as I (sort of and masochistically) did while making it.
